title: How can i get BE?

replies.body: You still get BE the normal ways. You can disenchant champion shards for BE but you can also get some from chests and capsules.

yeah they changed the system now i cant get anything ... i dont even have that much BE and i was so close to buy Renekton :(

Edit: just found this out on the update notes: "Instead of getting IP after every game, you'll receive an unlocked chest each time you level up. Capsules contain champ shards and blue essence, and if you hit special milestone levels, you'll earn special rewards like gemstones or rare emotes."
